ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( PRIORVALUE(Reserved__c ) = true, NOT(ISNEW()), OR( $Profile.Name = "ICONiCS_SA_Manager", $Profile.Name = "ICON_SA Manager", $Profile.Name = "ICON_SAManager_EVERYWHERE" ), My_Store__c =false )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You are not allowed to modify a reserved order that is not attached to your store
